author: ate
msg: Fix UnsupportedOperationException in JPT as the User.infoMap is (by design) unmodifiable.
I hit this one when connecting with a new user without any attributes.
Adding a String getUserAttribute(name,defaultValue) as convenient helper method and adjusting the layout header.vm's accordingly

author: antelder
msg: Add a two nodes test using hazelcast, and have the Server/Client classes use the Node api that takes the domain config uri

author: rickhall
msg: Attribute value is not always comparable.
